name: Growing Circles Game
description:
GAME SUMMARY

Click on the circles when they hit the green ring, but don't let them hit the red ring!

Hit green ring = +5pts
Hit red ring = -10pts and -1 lives

Start with 1 life - 100pts = 1 life!

Hit a red ring and you lose a life! Hit a red ring with no lives left and it's game over!
